Ext.namespace("Ext.coo.act.model");Ext.coo.act.model.g_url="coo/act_model.do";Ext.coo.act.model.extWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{params:{},constructor:function(){this.form=new Ext.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",autoHeight:true,border:false,bodyStyle:"padding:5px;",labelWidth:65,items:[{xtype:"fjs-store-radio",name:"Suffix",fieldLabel:"文件类型",dictId:"system.export.excel",groupcfg:{name:"Suffix"}}]});Ext.coo.act.model.extWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-excel",title:"Excel 格式",width:320,autoHeight:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){this.params.action="export";this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,params:this.params,success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))},apply_success:function(form,opts){Ext.fjs.download("/down.php?filename="+opts.result.message);this.window_close()}});Ext.coo.act.model.addWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"coo/act_model.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"textfield",name:"NAME",width:120,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:50},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"RATE",width:80,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10},{xtype:"fjs-datefield",name:"SDAY",allowBlank:false,format:"Y-m-d H:i:s",width:145},{xtype:"fjs-datefield",name:"EDAY",allowBlank:false,format:"Y-m-d H:i:s",width:145},{xtype:"textarea",name:"REMARK",width:390,height:63,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,emptyText:"",maxLength:5000}]});Ext.coo.act.model.addWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-add",title:"信息添加",width:600,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-save",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(this.form)){this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,params:{action:"save"},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()}});Ext.coo.act.model.modWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"coo/act_model.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"textfield",name:"NAME",width:120,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:50},{xtype:"numberfield",name:"RATE",width:80,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,decimalPrecision:2,minValue:0,maxValue:10},{xtype:"fjs-datefield",name:"SDAY",allowBlank:false,format:"Y-m-d H:i:s",width:145},{xtype:"fjs-datefield",name:"EDAY",allowBlank:false,format:"Y-m-d H:i:s",width:145},{xtype:"textarea",name:"REMARK",width:390,height:63,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,emptyText:"",maxLength:5000}]});Ext.coo.act.model.modWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-edit",title:"信息编辑",width:600,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-save",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(this.form)){this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,params:{action:"save",adj:this.adj},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()},open:function(adj){this.adj=adj;this.form.getForm().load(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,params:{action:"info",adj:adj},show:true,scope:this}))}});Ext.coo.act.model.adWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({frame:true,layout:"fit",items:[{xtype:"textarea",name:"INFO",width:270,height:215,boldLabel:true,emptyText:"",maxLength:5000}]});Ext.coo.act.model.adWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-add",title:"UID或手机号，一行一条",layout:"fit",width:300,height:300,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:this.form,buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.form.getForm().reset();this.hide()},window_submit:function(){if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(this.form)){this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,params:{action:"adds",rid:this.rid},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}},apply_success:function(from,opts){this.window_close();this.grid.refresh()}});Ext.coo.act.model.useWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;var sm=new Ext.grid.CheckboxSelectionModel();var cm=new Ext.grid.ColumnModel([sm,new Ext.grid.RowNumber()<s:header id="coo.coupon.user"/>]);this.store=new Ext.fjs.PageStore({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,baseParams:{action:"user"},fields:["SID","UID","MOBILE","NAME","STATE","TIME"]});this.gs=new Ext.grid.GridPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",region:"center",store:this.store,stripeRows:true,height:350,layout:"fit",border:false,autoScroll:true,boldHeader:true,closable:true,loadMask:true,columnLines:true,cm:cm,sm:sm,style:"padding:0px",bbar:Ext.fjs.PageToolBar({store:this.store})});this.delBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-delete",text:"删除",disabled:true,handler:this.del_onclick,scope:this});Ext.coo.act.model.useWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"mnu-user",title:"发放对象",width:600,autoHeight:true,border:true,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.gs],tbar:["->",{iconCls:"btn-add",text:"增加",handler:this.add_onclick,scope:this},"-",this.delBtn]});this.gs.getSelectionModel().on("selectionchange",this.evt_selection,this);this.on("hide",this.window_hide,this);this.on("show",this.refresh,this)},evt_selection:function(sm){var len=sm.getCount();if(len>=1){this.delBtn.enable()}else{this.delBtn.disable()}},refresh:function(){this.store.setBaseParam("RID",this.rid);this.store.load({params:{start:0,limit:this.gs.getBottomToolbar().pageSize}})},add_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.addWin;if(!w){this.addWin=w=new Ext.coo.act.model.adWindow(this)};w.rid=this.rid;w.show()},del_onclick:function(btn){Ext.msg.confirm(Ext.fjs.NOTICE,Ext.fjs.del_confirm,this.delConfirm,this)},delConfirm:function(btn){if(btn=="yes"){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,params:{action:"delUser",rid:this.rid,ids:Ext.fjs.getPKId(this.gs,"SID")},success:this.del_success,scope:this})}},del_success:function(res,opts){var rs=Ext.decode(res.responseText);if(rs.success){this.refresh()}else{Ext.fjs.showError(rs.message)}},window_hide:function(){var c=this.store.getTotalCount();Ext.fjs.set(this.grid,"TOTAL",c);this.store.removeAll()},beforeDestroy:function(){if(this.addWin)Ext.destroy(this.addWin);Ext.coo.act.model.useWindow.superclass.beforeDestroy.call(this)}});Ext.coo.act.model.MainPanel=Ext.extend(Ext.grid.GridPanel,{constructor:function(){this.addBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-add",text:"增加",tooltip:"增加",disabled:false,handler:this.add_onclick,scope:this});this.useBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"mnu-user",text:"规则",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.user_onclick,scope:this});this.enaBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"启用",tooltip:"启用",disabled:true,handler:this.state_onclick,state:0,scope:this});this.disBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"停用",tooltip:"停用",disabled:true,handler:this.state_onclick,state:1,scope:this});this.extBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-excel",text:"导出",tooltip:"导出",disabled:false,handler:this.export_onclick,scope:this});var sm=new Ext.grid.CheckboxSelectionModel();var cm=new Ext.grid.ColumnModel([sm,new Ext.grid.RowNumber()<s:header id="coo.act.model"/>]);this.store=new Ext.fjs.PageStore({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,baseParams:{action:"list"},fields:[<s:fields id="coo.act.model"/>]});this.store.load({params:{start:0,limit:Ext.fjs.defPSize}});Ext.coo.act.model.MainPanel.superclass.constructor.call(this,{region:"center",store:this.store,stripeRows:true,autoScroll:true,boldHeader:true,closable:true,containerScroll:true,columnLines:true,cm:cm,sm:sm,loadMask:true,tbar:[this.fsel=new Ext.fjs.form.StoreComboBox({xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"fsel",dictId:"system.state",allowBlank:true,allrec:true,value:-1,width:85}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.fkey=new Ext.form.TextField({xtype:"textfield",name:"fkey",width:100,maxLength:50}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},{iconCls:"btn-search",tooltip:"查询",handler:this.search_onclick,scope:this},"->",this.addBtn,"-",this.useBtn,"-",this.enaBtn,"-",this.disBtn,"-",this.extBtn],bbar:Ext.fjs.PageToolBar({store:this.store})});this.getSelectionModel().on("selectionchange",this.evt_selection,this);this.on("rowdblclick",this.mod_onclick,this)},evt_selection:function(sm){var len=sm.getCount();if(len==1){this.useBtn.enable()}else{this.useBtn.disable()};if(len>=1){this.disBtn.enable();this.enaBtn.enable()}else{this.disBtn.disable();this.enaBtn.disable()}},getAdj:function(){return Ext.fjs.getPKId(this,"ADJ")},refresh:function(){this.getBottomToolbar().doRefresh()},search_onclick:function(){var s=this.store;s.setBaseParam("STATE",this.fsel.getValue()||-1);s.setBaseParam("KEY",this.fkey.getValue());s.load({params:{start:0,limit:this.getBottomToolbar().pageSize}})},add_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.addWin;if(!w){this.addWin=w=new Ext.coo.act.model.addWindow(this)};w.show(btn.id)},mod_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.modWin;if(!w){this.modWin=w=new Ext.coo.act.model.modWindow(this)};w.open(this.getAdj())},user_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.useWin;if(!w){this.useWin=w=new Ext.coo.act.model.useWindow(this)};w.rid=this.getRid();w.show(btn.id)},state_onclick:function(t){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.coo.act.model.g_url,params:{action:"state",ids:this.getAdj(),state:t.state},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})},apply_success:function(res,opts){var rs=Ext.decode(res.responseText);if(rs.success){this.refresh()}else{Ext.fjs.showError(rs.message)}},export_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.extWin;if(!w){this.extWin=w=new Ext.coo.act.model.extWindow()};w.show(btn.id)},beforeDestroy:function(){if(this.addWin)Ext.destroy(this.addWin);if(this.modWin)Ext.destroy(this.modWin);if(this.useWin)Ext.destroy(this.useWin);if(this.extWin)Ext.destroy(this.extWin);Ext.coo.act.model.MainPanel.superclass.beforeDestroy.call(this)}});
